def main():
    """
    Main function
    """
    # Read inputs
    n = int(input())
    k = int(input())
    x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

    # Sort balls
    x.sort()

    # Calculate distance
    distance = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i < n//2:
            distance += x[i]
        else:
            distance += k - x[i]

    # Print distance
    print(distance)
